mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAR_INFO (CAR_ID, ORIGIN, MANUFACTURER, MODEL, DETAILED_MODEL, VEH_NUM, PRICE, MODEL_YEAR, FUEL, ADDR_CITY, TRANSMISSION, CARGRADE, DETAILED_CARGRADE, DRIVEN_DIST, ACCIDENT_INFO, OPTIONS, COLOR, DTL_IMG_CAR, SALE_STATUS, PANER_ID, SKELETON_ID) VALUE (#{CAR_ID}, #{ORIGIN}, #{MANUFACTURER}, #{MODEL}, #{DETAILED_MODEL}, #{VEH_NUM}, #{PRICE}, #{MODEL_YEAR}, #{FUEL}, #{ADDR_CITY}, #{TRANSMISSION}, #{CARGRADE}, #{DETAILED_CARGRADE}, #{DRIVEN_DIST}, #{ACCIDENT_INFO}, #{OPTIONS}, #{COLOR}, #{DTL_IMG_CAR}, #{SALE_STATUS}, #{PANER_ID}, #{SKELETON_ID})

INSERT INTO CAR_PANEL (PANER_ID, HOOD, FRONT_FENDER, DOOR, SIDE_PANEL, TRUNK_LID, ROOF_PANEL, QUARTER_PANEL) VALUES (#{PANER_ID},#{HOOD}, #{FRONT_FENDER}, #{DOOR}, #{SIDE_PANEL}, #{TRUNK_LID}, #{ROOF_PANEL}, #{QUARTER_PANEL})

INSERT INTO CAR_MAIN_SKELETON (SKELETON_ID, FRONT_PANEL, CROSS_MEMBER, INSIDE_PANEL, SIDE_MEMBER, WHEEL_HOUSE, PACKAGE_TRAY, DASH_PANEL, FLOOR_PANEL, FILER_PANEL, REAR_PANEL, TRUNK_FLOOR) VALUES (#{SKELETON_ID}, #{FRONT_PANEL}, #{CROSS_MEMBER}, #{INSIDE_PANEL}, #{SIDE_MEMBER}, #{WHEEL_HOUSE}, #{PACKAGE_TRAY}, #{DASH_PANEL}, #{FLOOR_PANEL}, #{FILER_PANEL}, #{REAR_PANEL}, #{TRUNK_FLOOR})
INSERT INTO SALE_STATUS (STATUS_ID, STATUS, SALE_DATE) VALUES (#{STATUS_ID}, 'sale', 'none')
INSERT INTO CAR_DETAILE_INFO (CAR_DTL_ID, CAR_ID, STATUS_ID, DEALER_ID) VALUES (#{CAR_DTL_ID}, #{CAR_ID}, #{STATUS_ID}, #{DEALER_ID})
